name: Roll Spalt!
description:
With a simple Control and unique you can move Roll Splat in the maze up, down and around to make colors all around the maze. In Roll Splat Challenge Complete the levels by covering every hallway and every corner with a bright, colorful paint. It's so much fun.

FEATURES
- Simple Puzzles.
- 100 Levels.
- Smooth and satisfactory rolling action.
- fun and relaxing to play
- Free to play
- More Fascinating Colors
- Simple and satisfying
- Beautifully clean and fluid paint physics

Roll Splat! it's a free game. Enjoy the FREE game and share it to your best friends.
